ServerConfiguration.description: The server name and network port required to connect with the management interface of the on-premises storage system.

properties.name: ServerHostname
properties.description: The domain name or IP address of the storage system's management interface.

type.description: The domain name or IP address of the storage system's management interface.

properties.name: ServerPort
properties.description: The network port needed to access the system's management interface

type.description: The network port needed to access the system's management interface

ServerCredentials.description: The username and password for accessing your on-premises storage system's management interface.

properties.name: Username
properties.description: The username for your storage system's management interface.

type.description: The username for your storage system's management interface.

properties.name: Password
properties.description: The password for your storage system's management interface

type.description: The password for your storage system's management interface

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

properties.name: SystemType
properties.description: The type of on-premises storage system that DataSync Discovery will analyze.

type.description: The type of on-premises storage system that DataSync Discovery will analyze.

properties.name: AgentArns
properties.description: The ARN of the DataSync agent that connects to and reads from the on-premises storage system's management interface.

type.description: The ARN of the DataSync agent that connects to and reads from the on-premises storage system's management interface.

properties.name: CloudWatchLogGroupArn
properties.description: The ARN of the Amazon CloudWatch log group used to monitor and log discovery job events.

type.description: The ARN of the Amazon CloudWatch log group used to monitor and log discovery job events.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: A familiar name for the on-premises storage system.

type.description: A familiar name for the on-premises storage system.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: SecretsManagerArn
properties.description: The ARN of a secret stored by AWS Secrets Manager.

type.description: The ARN of a secret stored by AWS Secrets Manager.

properties.name: StorageSystemArn
properties.description: The ARN of the on-premises storage system added to DataSync Discovery.

type.description: The ARN of the on-premises storage system added to DataSync Discovery.

properties.name: ConnectivityStatus
properties.description: Indicates whether the DataSync agent can access the on-premises storage system.

type.description: Indicates whether the DataSync agent can access the on-premises storage system.
